flawed_nl_solution:
She has 240 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
She will write 240 words because 240 x 10 = <<240*10=240>>240
She will earn $24 for the words because 240 x 0.1 = <<240*0.1=24>>24
She will earn $180 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=180>>180
She will earn $204 in total because 24 + 180 = <<24+180=204>>204
She will average $51 an hour because 204 / 4 = <<204/4=51>>51
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 240. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
